name: string
Name of the experiment (your are free to use capital letters, when needed)
fluxfile: Path of the fluxes file with respect to the parent directory, it will have the form 'fluxes/flux_file.dat'
flux_norm: flux normalization factor: ALL FLUXES ARE NORMALIZED SO THAT THE UNITS ARE nus/cm^2/GeV/POT
nuclear_targets: Detector materials in the form of '<element_name><mass_number>' (e.g. 'Ar40')
fiducial_mass_fraction_per_target: Fiducial mass fraction for each target in order, the total sum should be 1
